title: Learn Python Basics
description: Get started with Python programming, covering syntax, variables, and data types.

title: JavaScript Essentials
description: An introduction to JavaScript syntax, DOM manipulation, and basic debugging.

title: Understanding Data Structures
description: Learn about arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and efficient data handling.

title: Mastering Algebra
description: Review fundamental algebraic concepts such as linear equations and factoring.

description: Explore the basics of React, from components and props to state management.

title: CSS Grid and Flexbox
description: Delve into modern CSS layout techniques and responsive design patterns.

title: Calculus Fundamentals
description: Introduction to limits, derivatives, and integrals for beginner calculus students.

title: Intro to French Language
description: Basic vocabulary, greetings, and grammar rules for beginner French learners.

title: Software Architecture Basics
description: High-level design principles, architectural patterns, and best practices.

title: Number Theory for Beginners
description: Explore prime numbers, modular arithmetic, and fundamental number theory concepts.
